items.title: iPhone 18 series mass production testing to begin very soon
items.summary: According to a new rumor from China, Apple will start testing the iPhone 18 series devices on the mass production line "one after another" in the very early days of January. Then, the actual production is set to start right before the Chinese New Year, which in 2026 falls on February 17. The iPhoneâ€¦

items.summary: CBS News is increasingly looking like something out of a scripted drama by Aaron Sorkin. In shows like â€œThe Newsroomâ€ and â€œSports Night,â€ the well-regarded writer sketched stories of feisty media outlets just trying to get news to the people, even though doing so sometimes brought unwanted scrutinyâ€¦

items.summary: James Cameron was the butt of one of Amy Poehlerâ€™s most ruthless Golden Globes jokes, one heâ€™s now calling an â€œignorant digâ€ at his expense. Speaking in a recent interview with The New York Times, the â€œTitanicâ€ Oscar winner said Poehler took things â€œtoo farâ€ when she poked fun at his marriage to Biâ€¦

items.title: Gigabyte removes controversial leaking thermal gel from RTX 5070 Ti Windforce V2 â€” company opts for traditional thermal pads with updated graphics card
items.summary: The second iteration of Gigabyte's RTX 5070 Ti triple-fan Windforce graphics card comes with traditional thermal pads.

items.title: Pirate library rips 86 million of the most popular songs on Spotify
items.summary: Spotify says it has launched new protections against "anti-copyright attacks" after the open-source library / pirate activist group Anna's Archive announced it's ripped 86 million songs from the platform that it plans to make available in torrents, as reported earlier by Billboard. According to theâ€¦

items.summary: Itâ€™s time to start thinking up festive meal ideas for Christmas and New Years. But if youâ€™re already wiped out from all the cooking that family get-togethers entail during this time of year (or have never liked spending too much time in the kitchen) there are countless delivery and meal prep servicâ€¦

items.summary: Ahead of CES 2026 getting underway in early January, Birdfy has announced two new camera-equipped smart bird feeders that can identify and capture visitors in slow motion. The Birdfy Hum Bloom is specifically designed to attract and record hummingbirds using a nectar bulb that mimics flowers they'râ€¦
